subtitle: A warming casserole that is rich in flavour with bacon, mushrooms, red wine and garlic.

method.text: Wrap bacon around chicken. Mix nutmeg into seasoned flour. Use to coat chicken.

Heat oil in large pan and cook garlic for 30 sec. Add chicken and any remaining flour and cook for 1 min, turning chicken over once. Stir in wine and stock and bring to boil stirring. Add parsley, then transfer to an ovenproof casserole.
Stir in mushrooms and return to oven for further 15 min. Remove from oven and serve.

title: Chicken and mushroom casserole
